mapper.sql: id, device_id, device_longitude, device_latitude, accuracy, step, data_time, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select: select sum(step) from st_device_info where data_time between #{start} and #{end} and device_id = #{did};
select device_longitude, device_latitude, data_time from st_device_info where data_time between #{start} and #{end} and device_id = #{device_id} order by data_time
select sum(step) from st_device_info where device_id = #{did};
mapper.insert: insert into st_device_info (id, device_id, step, device_longitude, device_latitude, accuracy,data_time, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{step,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accuracy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

mapper.update:
update st_device_info
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
step = #{step,jdbcType=BIGINT},
device_longitude = #{deviceLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_latitude = #{deviceLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accuracy = #{accuracy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update st_device_info set device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, step = #{step,jdbcType=BIGINT}, device_longitude = #{deviceLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_latitude = #{deviceLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accuracy = #{accuracy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_time = #{dataTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
